name: Cave escape (itch) (Gwendal)
description:
Cave Escape

A short game inspired by Cavyn from DaFluffyPotato

Avoid the falling blocks, collect treasures and get to the top of the cave.

  • Press space to start the game
  • Press r to restart

Controls :

  • left/right keys : left and right movement
  • up key/space : jump
